title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Publish Tiddler
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/readme","text":"* Publish Tiddler Manager
* not save storylist to html
* support Publish or not manager

!! TODO

* support article by filter
* add ui to manage field
* add plugin work details with tiddlywiki

* [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler]]
* [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]]
"},"$:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/config":{"title":"$:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/config"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/example":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/example"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon","text":"<svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" version="1" viewBox="0 0 48 48" enable-background="new 0 0 48 48" height="1em" width="1em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><polygon fill="#F57C00" points="29,23 19,23 7,9 41,9"></polygon><g fill="#FF9800"><polygon points="29,38 19,44 19,23 29,23"></polygon><path d="M41.5,9h-35C5.7,9,5,8.3,5,7.5v0C5,6.7,5.7,6,6.5,6h35C42.3,6,43,6.7,43,7.5v0C43,8.3,42.3,9,41.5,9z"></path></g><circle fill="#F44336" cx="38" cy="38" r="10"></circle><rect x="32" y="36" fill="#fff" width="12" height="4"></rect></svg>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define publishFilter()
-[[$:/StoryList]] -[all[tiddlers+shadows]!is[system]!has[draft.of]field:publish[no]] -[tag[private]] -[tag[todo]] -[tag[Journal]] -[tag[books]]
\end
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/script":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/script","tags":"$:/tags/RawMarkupWikified/BottomBody"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"}}}
